name: calendar-booking-platform
description: Calendar booking platform with Google Calendar integration

scripts.db:reset:
pkill -f 'nest start' || true && cd apps/api && rm -f prisma/*.db* && rm -rf prisma/migrations && rm -rf node_modules/.prisma && rm -rf node_modules/@prisma && npm install @prisma/client prisma && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && cd ../.. && echo '
âœ… Database reset complete! Run: npm run dev'
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.test:cov: npm run test:api -- --coverage && npm run test:web -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:api && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/build packages/*/dist
